text: @ishtiaqarehman @MansoorGajani @officialFakeera I am not here to advocate for @ImranKhanPTI but #Zardari has a big carnage that is non-negotiable because #Pakistan has collectively suffered at all levels.There is absolutely no sympathy to be found to allow the devil to abuse #18thAmendment @ cost of democratic rights of masses
